mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS count, AVG(r.SCORE) AS score from review r left join product_option po on po.option_pk = r.option_fk left join product p on p.product_pk = po.product_fk where p.product_pk = #{productPk}

SELECT product_fk, option_fk, review_pk, r.member_fk, r.img AS image_url, score, member_id, content, created_time, po.OPTION_NAME, p.PET_NAME , p.PET_TYPE , p.AGE , p.GENDER , p.CHEHYEONG FROM REVIEW r left join product_option po on po.option_pk = r.option_fk left join PET p on p.PET_PK = r.PET_FK left join member m on m.member_pk = r.MEMBER_FK where product_fk = #{productPk}
